quoteText: We also allow specific partners to collect information from your browser or device for advertising and measurement purposes using their own cookies or similar technologies.
title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: Quote that was there seems to be from the Google privacy policy; updated to the quote that is found in the docs of this service.
